text:
Kirby Robert Morrow (August 28, 1973 – November 18, 2020) was a Canadian actor, writer and comedian. Morrow was born in Jasper, Alberta.
He was known as the voice of Miroku from "InuYasha", Van Fanel from the Ocean dub of "Escaflowne", Cyclops from "X-Men Evolution", Jay from "Class of the Titans", Teru Mikami from "Death Note", Goku from Ocean's dub of "Dragon Ball Z" and Cole from '.
